name: Dodge Mania (EpicStudios)
description:
This is my newest itch.io game: Dodge Mania! It's a complete dodging game that has smooth graphics and easy controls! You are a red ball that has to fight the hardships of being in a flurry of red dots that can kill you! The more green dots you collect the more points you get! It's free but please donate so it motivates me to make more epic games!

Peace out,

EpicStudios
